definitions.definition: One who acts to confound or obfuscate ; an obscurantist .
A person who seeks to prevent or hinder enquiry and the advancement of knowledge or wisdom ; an agent of endarkenment .
An opposer of lucidity and transparency in the political and intellectual spheres .

main_definition: One who acts to confound or obfuscate ; an obscurantist .
secondary_definitions: A person who seeks to prevent or hinder enquiry and the advancement of knowledge or wisdom ; an agent of endarkenment .
An opposer of lucidity and transparency in the political and intellectual spheres .
